#-----Solution-----

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

#-----Solution 2-----

a.sort()

max_weight = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > max_weight + 1:
        break
    max_weight = a[i]

print(i + 1)


#-----Solution 1-----

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

max_weight = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > max_weight + 1:
        break
    max_weight = a[i]

print(i + 1)
